channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping and abandoned bin, 11th July
item.description:
Flytip been here over a month Abandoned bin also discarded for several months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99, St John's Park, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress & sheets dumped in butterfield park (2nd report), 11th July
item.description:
Mattress and sheets dumped behind the path that runs adjacent to shakespeare adventure playground (where the frui trees are, part of butterfield green). this was reported last night (it has been there for weeks) & was marked as resolved but is still there

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped green waste bin with rubble inside, 11th July
item.description:
Has been here for months. Abandoned / flytipped

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, St John's Park, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste, furniture, 11th July
item.description:
Ten days household waste and furniture have been damped behind the wall facing Woodpecker road. It is not the first time. Some residents of Whimbrel close ( number 3 or 4) have been seen and challenged few times but continue put their rubbish/ waste here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whimbrel Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Metal Bollards and Chains Destroyed, 11th July
item.description:
Numerous metal bollards and chains broken and lying over the ground right opposite St. James’s Palace. Has been like this repeatedly and for a very long time but nothing is done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pall Mall, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish from flats blocking pavement, 11th July
item.description:
The rubbish has been here for 4 days not collected, it’s stopping our customers from getting to our business. Wherlchair uses are complaining they have to go on the road where the crossings are, putting them on the road for 60 metres.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Morning Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van abandoned on junction of road, 11th July
item.description:
Van has not moved for a month or so now, it looks like a dumped builders van, but I believe it is taxed. It has been left right on the junction with brake spears drive, and is an accident waiting to happen, when you try to pull out of Blythe hill, or turn into Blythe hill from breakspears drive, it won’t be long before an accident takes place, it needs to be moved asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blythe Hill, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flies around bins and smelly bins in the whole street, 11th July
item.description:
Due to hot temperatures the two weekly waste collection is not sufficient. The whole street smells of rotten food and there are flies everyone. This is unpleasant and not hygienic. With the coming weeks being very hot still problem will continue unless rubbish is collected more frequently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Tarbert Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has been abandoned in a car park untaxed, 11th July
item.description:
It has been left in a gp surgery carpark abandoned and untaxed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Farm Road, Mottingham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping on the block, 11th July

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buckley Road, London

item.title: The pavement opposite asdas in lower belvedere, 11th July
item.description:
There is rubbish on the pavement and in the road blocking drains .This is Causing a trip hazard on the pavements . And encouraging vermin to breed .( Each week after the bins have been emptied.) Nobody is pick up the spillages. This week's was the worst I have seen . With food and rubbish on the pavement under parked cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers in road, 11th July
item.description:
Barriers have been placed around a small dip in the road, but there are no traffic lights or work being carried out. This is causing long traffic queues. Unless work is scheduled for this evening, please arrange for these barriers to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Crofton Lane, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unattended roadworks causing massive obstruction, 11th July
item.description:
Unattended roadwork barrier with no temporary lights causing a mile long queue from Crofton Road roundabout up to Crofton school. There is no work being carried out and no temp lights. Please investigate urgently
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Crofton Lane, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox left on front lawn 23 Tudor Way, 11th July
item.description:
On Thursday there was a dead fox in the middle of the road (Tudor Way). This has been reported. Now this dead fox has been left over the front lawn edging of 23 Tudor Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedges need trimming, 11th July
item.description:
The hedges along the footpath along Bayswater Road between Clarendon Place and Brook Street are very overgrown. They are the hedges that belong to the homes on 1-24 Hyde Park Gardens. They have a large gardening company that does all the gardens so can they be asked to trim this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Park Place Bayswater Road, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet
